Tavi muab Xa‑u raab ntaaj lug sa rws zawm lub tsho hlau rua ntawm duav, tes nwg swm moog kev mas moog tsw taug tsua qhov nwg naav tsw kaam tej ntawd. Tes Tavi txawm has rua Xa‑u tas, “Kuv naav tej nuav moog tsw taug, tsua qhov kuv naav tsw kaam.” Tes Tavi txawm muab hle.

Nwg tuav rawv nwg tug paas nreg hab xaiv tswb lub qai zeb kheej kheej huv haav lug ntim rua huv nwg lub naab thoob puab kws nwg khuam yug yaaj. Nwg nqaa ib txuj hlua fav ntaus qai zeb, nwg naam zog moog ze tug Filixatee hov.
Tug yawm Filixatee hov kuj naam zog tuaj ze Tavi, tug kws tuav daim phaj hlau thaiv kuj ua nwg ntej.
Thaus tug Filixatee tsaa muag saib pum Tavi nwg kuj saib tsw taug Tavi tsua qhov Tavi tsuas yog ib tug hluas ntsej muag tshab lab ploog zoo nraug ntxag xwb.
Nwg txawm has rua Tavi tas, “Kuv yog dev lov es koj yuav coj ib tug nyuas paas tuaj ntawm kuv?” Tes nwg txawm tuav nwg tej daab qhua lub npe tsawm foom Tavi.
Tug Filixatee has rua Tavi tas, “Ca le lug rua ntawm kuv nuav. Kuv yuav muab koj tej nqaj rua tej laj daav sau nruab ntug hab tej tsaj qus noj.”

Tes Tavi has rua nwg tas, “Koj coj ntaaj coj muv hab coj muv nkaug tuaj tawm tsaam kuv. Tassws kuv tuav Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus lub npe tuaj tawm tsaam koj. Nwg yog Yixayee paab tub rog tug Vaajtswv kws koj twv ntxhas.

Nub nua Yawmsaub yuav muab koj cob rua huv kuv txhais teg, kuv yuav muab koj tua hab muab koj lub taubhau txav pov tseg. Nub nua kuv yuav muab Filixatee cov tub rog tej cev tuag rua tej laj daav sau nruab ntug hab tej tsaj qus huv nplajteb noj, mas ib tsoom tuabneeg huv qaab ntuj yuav paub tas muaj ib tug Vaajtswv nyob huv Yixayee,

hab tej tuabneeg kws tuaj ua ke nuav huvsw yuav paub tas Yawmsaub tsw yog swv ntaaj swv muv cawm tuabneeg, tsua qhov kev ua rog zag nuav yog Yawmsaub ua, mas nwg yuav muab mej cob rua huv peb txhais teg.”
Thaus tug Filixatee hov sawv tseeg naam zog tuaj ze yuav ntaus Tavi, Tavi kuj dha ceev nrooj moog rua ntawm lub chaw ua rog rua tug Filixatee hov.
Tavi cev teg rhu hlo ib lub qai zeb huv lub naab lug fav ntawm txuj hlua ntaus raug tug Filixatee hov hauv plaj. Lub qai zeb ntsa nkaus rua huv hauv plaj ua rua nwg qaug khwb nkaus rua huv aav.
Yog le nuav Tavi txhad swv txuj hlua fav hab ib lub qai zeb xwb kov yeej tug Filixatee hov. Nwg muab tug Filixatee ntaus hab muab tua pov tseg. Tavi tsw muaj ntaaj huv nwg txhais teg le.

Tavi txhad dha moog sawv hlo sau tug hov lub cev tuag hab rhu hlo raab ntaaj huv tug Filixatee hov lub naab lug txav lub taubhau tu nrho. Thaus cov Filixatee pum tug tub rog kws nyob puab chaw ua rog tuag lawm, puab txhad tig hlo tswv.

Cov Yixayee hab cov Yuta txawm sawv tseeg qw nrov moog lawv caum cov Filixatee moog txug ncua lub moos Ka hab txug lub rooj loog lub moos Ekhoo. Cov Filixatee kws raug mob txhad qaug taug kev ntawm lub moos Sa‑ala‑i moog txug ncua lub moos Ka hab lub moos Ekhoo.
Mas cov Yixayee txhad rov qaab lug tsw lawv cov Filixatee lawm hab moog lws tej hov txhua chaw huv puab lub yeej.
Tavi kuj coj tug Filixatee hov lub taubhau moog rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalee. Tassws tej cuab yeej mas Tavi coj moog khaws rua huv nwg lub tsev ntaub.

Thaus Xa‑u pum Tavi tawm moog ntaus rog rua tug Filixatee hov, nwg txawm has rua Anaw kws yog nwg tug thawj rog tas, “Anaw, tug hluas hov yog leejtwg le tub?” Anaw teb tas, “Vaajntxwv kws muaj txujsa nyob, kuv yeej tsw paub hab.”
Vaajntxwv txawm has tas, “Ca le moog nug saib tug nyuas hluas hov yog leejtwg le tub.”
Thaus Tavi moog tua tug Filixatee rov lug, Anaw coj nwg moog cuag Xa‑u. Tavi nqaa rawv tug Filixatee hov lub taubhau moog hab.
Xa‑u txhad nug tas, “Tub hluas 'e, koj yog leejtwg le tub?” Tavi teb tas, “Kuv yog koj tug qhev Yexi tug tub, yog tuabneeg huv Npelehee.”
Thaus Tavi has rua Xa‑u taag lawd, Yaunathaa txawm nrug Tavi koom ib lub sab hab hlub Tavi ib yaam le nwg hlub nwg tug kheej.
Tes nub ntawd Xa‑u txawm kuas Tavi nrug nwg nyob tsw kheev Tavi rov qaab moog rua nwg txwv tsev.
Mas Yaunathaa nrug Tavi cog lug sws raug zoo tsua qhov nwg hlub Tavi ib yaam le nwg hlub nwg tug kheej.
Yaunathaa hle nwg lub tsho ntev pub rua Tavi. Nwg lub tsho hlau hab nwg raab ntaaj raab neev hab txuj hlaab tawv los nwg kuj pub rua Tavi.

Xa‑u khaiv Tavi moog hovtwg, los Tavi kuj tawm moog ua num tav quas log. Vem le nuav Xa‑u txhad tsaa Tavi ua thawj kaav cov tub rog. Tej kws Xa‑u ua hov mas cov pejxeem suavdawg hab Xa‑u cov tub teg tub taw puavleej pum zoo.

Thaus Tavi tua tau tug Filixatee hov lawm es cov tub rog suavdawg rov lug, cov quaspuj huv Yixayee txhua lub moos txawm tawm tuaj hu nkauj seev cev tog vaajntxwv Xa‑u. Puab npuaj nruag hu nkauj zoo sab xyiv faab hab tshuab raaj ntaus nkauj nog ncaas.
Thaus cov quaspuj hu nkauj zoo sab xyiv faab hov puab hu tas, “Xa‑u tua tau quas txheeb leej, Tavi tua tau quas vaam leej.”

Xa‑u txawm chim heev, nwg tsw txaus sab rua tej lug kws puab hu hov. Nwg has tas, “Puab suav quas vaam leej rua Tavi, tassws suav quas txheeb leej rua kuv xwb. Tseed tshuav daabtsw kws Tavi yuav tau tsuas yog tshuav lub tebchaws xwb?”
Tes txwj nub hov lug Xa‑u txawm nyaag quas ntshws Tavi.

Nub tom qaab Vaajtswv ca ib tug plig phem lug tshoov Xa‑u lub sab, tes Xa‑u txawm chiv vwm rua huv nwg lub tsev rua thaus Tavi saamswm ntaus nkauj nog ncaas ib yaam le nwg naj nub ntaus. Xa‑u tuav rawv ib raab muv huv nwg txhais teg.
Xa‑u txawm tuab nkaug muv xaav has tas, “Kuv yuav nkaug Tavi ntsa nkaus rua tim phaab ntsaa.” Kuas Tavi mam dhau ob zag.
Xa‑u kuj ntshai Tavi tsua qhov Yawmsaub nrug nraim Tavi tassws tub ncaim ntawm Xa‑u lawm.
Yog le ntawd Xa‑u txhad muab Tavi lawv tawm, muab Tavi tsaa ua thawj kaav ib txheeb leej tub rog, Tavi txhad coj cov tub rog tawm moog hab rov lug.
Tavi ua daabtsw kuj ua tau tav huvsw, tsua qhov Yawmsaub nrug nraim nwg.
Thaus Xa‑u pum tas Tavi ua tau num tav zoo, nwg kuj ntshai Tavi.
Tassws cov Yixayee hab cov Yuta suavdawg nyam Tavi tsua qhov nwg pheej coj puab tawm moog ua rog hab rov lug.

Tes Xa‑u has rua Tavi tas, “Nuav yog kuv tug ntxhais hlub kws hu ua Mela. Kuv yuav muab nwg qua rua koj yuav ua quaspuj. Tsuav yog koj muaj lub sab tuab paab kuv hab ua rog rua Yawmsaub cov yeeb ncuab xwb.” Tsua qhov Xa‑u xaav has tas, “Tsw xob ca kuv tsaa kuv txhais teg ntaus nwg, ca cov Filixatee ntaus nwg.”
Tavi has rua Xa‑u tas, “Huv cov Yixayee kuv yog leejtwg hab kuv cov kwvtij kws yog kuv txwv tsev tuabneeg yog leejtwg es kuv yuav lug ua tau vaajntxwv le vauv?”
Tassws thaus txug swjhawm kws Xa‑u yuav muab nwg tug ntxhais Mela rua Tavi, nwg txawm muab qua kag rua Anti‑ee kws yog tuabneeg huv lub moos Mehaula.
Xa‑u tug ntxhais Mikhaa kuj nyam Tavi. Muaj tuabneeg moog has rua Xa‑u paub, Xa‑u kuj txaus sab.

Xa‑u xaav has tas, “Kuv yuav muab nwg qua rua Tavi sub nwg txhad ua tau rooj hlua cuab Tavi hab cov Filixatee txhais teg txhad le tawm tsaam nwg.” Yog le nuav Xa‑u txhad has rua Tavi zag ob tas, “Zag nuav koj yuav ua kuv le vauv.”

Xa‑u has rua nwg cov tub teg tub taw tas, “Mej has tuabywv rua Tavi tas, ‘Saib maj, vaajntxwv txaus sab rua koj hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw suavdawg kuj nyam koj. Nwgnuav koj ca le kaam ua vaajntxwv le vauv los maj.’ ”

Xa‑u cov tub teg tub taw has tej lug hov rua Tavi noog. Tavi txawm has tas, “Mej pum tas qhov kws ua vaajntxwv le vauv yog ib qho miv miv xwb lov? Kuv yog ib tug tuabneeg pluag hab tsw muaj koob meej daabtsw le.”
Cov tub teg tub taw txhad pav rua Xa‑u tas “Tavi has le u le nuav.”

Xa‑u txhad has tas, “Mej ca le has rua Tavi tas, ‘Vaajntxwv tsw yuav nqe mig nqe no daabtsw le tsuas yog yuav cov Filixatee ib puas daim tawv chaw xws sub txhad pauj taub tau vaajntxwv cov yeeb ncuab.’ ” Xa‑u yeej xaav has tas yuav ua rua Tavi tuag rua huv cov Filixatee txhais teg.
Thaus Xa‑u cov tub teg tub taw pav tej lug hov rua Tavi noog, mas Tavi kuj txaus sab ua vaajntxwv le vauv. Thaus tsw tau txug lub swjhawm kws teem ca,

Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg txawm tawm moog tua cov Filixatee tau ob puas leej, mas Tavi muab puab tej daim tawv chaw xws npaum nkaus le kws has tseg lawd coj lug pub rua vaajntxwv es yuav ua vaajntxwv le vauv. Xa‑u txhad muab nwg tug ntxhais Mikhaa qua rua Tavi yuav ua quaspuj.
Thaus Xa‑u pum hab paub tas Yawmsaub nrug nraim Tavi hab nwg tug ntxhais Mikhaa nyam Tavi,
Xa‑u yimfuab ntshai Tavi. Yog le hov Xa‑u ua yeeb ncuab rua Tavi moog le.
Filixatee cov thawj pheej tawm tuaj ua rog. Txhua zag kws puab tawm tuaj Tavi kov yeej ntau dua Xa‑u cov thawj tub rog suavdawg. Tes nwg lub koob meej txhad nrov nchaa heev.
Xa‑u has rua nwg tug tub Yaunathaa hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw suavdawg tas kuas puab muab Tavi tua pov tseg. Tassws Xa‑u tug tub Yaunathaa nyam Tavi heev.
Yaunathaa txhad has rua Tavi tas, “Kuv txwv Xa‑u nrhav kev tua koj pov tseg. Vem le nuav pigkig sawv ntxuv koj yuav tsum ceev faaj zoo, ca le moog tswv nraim nyob tuabywv.
Mas kuv yuav moog sawv ntsug ze ze kuv txwv rua huv daim teb kws koj moog tswv nraim hov, hab kuv yuav nrug kuv txwv thaam txug koj. Yog kuv paub le caag kuv yuav qha rua koj paub hab.”

Yaunathaa qhuas Tavi rua nwg txwv Xa‑u noog tas, “Vaajntxwv, thov koj tsw xob ua txhum rua Tavi kws yog koj tug qhev, tsua qhov Tavi tsw tau ua ib qho txhum rua koj hab tej num kws nwg ua kuj muaj nuj nqes ntau kawg rua koj,

vem nwg sev nyog nwg txujsa moog tua tug Filixatee hov hab Yawmsaub paab cov Yixayee suavdawg kov yeej luj kawg. Koj tub pum hab koj tub zoo sab kawg le lawm. Ua caag koj yuav ua txhum rua tug kws tsw tau ua txhum es yuav tua Tavi kws tsw to kev tua?”
Xa‑u kuj noog Yaunathaa has, Xa‑u txhad twv tas, “Yawmsaub kws muaj txujsa nyob pum, Tavi yuav tsw raug muab tua hlo le.”
Tes Yaunathaa txawm hu Tavi hab qha txhua yaam nuav rua nwg paub, hab Yaunathaa coj Tavi moog cuag Xa‑u, tes Tavi txhad tau lug nrug Xa‑u nyob le qub.
Rov muaj kev ua rog tuaj. Tavi kuj tawm moog ua rog rua cov Filixatee hab tua tuag coob heev, puab txhad tig tswv taag lawm.
Vaajtswv ca ib tug plig phem lug tshoov Xa‑u lub sab rua thaus nwg nyob tsawg huv nwg lub tsev hab tuav rawv raab muv. Tavi saamswm ntaus nkauj nog ncaas.
Xa‑u tuab nkaug xaav kuas ntsa nkaus Tavi rua ntawm phaab ntsaa, tassws Tavi mam dhau lawm. Xa‑u raab muv txhad rhais nreeg ntawm phaab ntsaa. Mas Tavi tswv dim mo ntawd.

Xa‑u tso tuabneeg moog rua ntawm Tavi lub tsev hab zuv tog yuav tua Tavi rua thaus kaaj ntug. Tassws Tavi tug quaspuj Mikhaa has rua Tavi tas, “Yog mo nuav koj tsw cawm koj txujsa pigkig koj yuav raug tua tuag xwb.”
Mikhaa txawm muab Tavi tso nqeg ntawm qhov rais nwg txhad tswv dim lawm.
Mikhaa muab ib tug txoov daab lug tso pw rua sau lub txaaj hab muab lub tog rau ncoo plaub tshws tso rua ntawm taubhau hab muab choj vuv rua.
Thaus Xa‑u tso tuabneeg moog nteg Tavi, Mikha has tas, “Nwg muaj mob.”
Tes Xa‑u txawm khaiv tuabneeg moog saib Tavi hab has tas, “Ca le nqaa hlo nwg lub txaaj hab nwg tuaj cuag kuv sub kuv txhad muab nwg tua tau pov tseg.”
Thaus cov tuabneeg nkaag lug saib na cav pum tug txoov daab pw sau lub txaaj hab lub tog rau ncoo plaub tshws nyob ntawm taubhau.
Xa‑u txhad has rua Mikhaa tas, “Ua caag koj yuav daag kuv es tso kuv tug yeeb ncuab dim moog lawm?” Mikhaa teb Xa‑u tas, “Nwg has rua kuv tas, ‘Tso kuv moog, yuav ca kuv muab koj tua lov?’ ”
Tavi txawm tswv dim moog cuag Xamuyee huv lub moos Lama hab pav txhua yaam kws Xa‑u tau ua rua nwg rua Xamuyee noog. Mas Xamuyee hab Tavi moog nyob huv lub zog Nayauj.
Muaj tuabneeg has rua Xa‑u tas, “Tavi nyob huv lub zog Nayauj ntawm lub moos Lama.”

Xa‑u txawm tso tuabneeg moog nteg Tavi. Thaus puab moog pum ib paab xwbfwb saamswm cev Vaajtswv lug hab Xamuyee sawv quas ntsug ua puab tug thawj, Vaajtswv tug Ntsuj Plig kuj lug kaav taag nrho cov kws Xa‑u tso tuaj tes puab txawm cev Vaajtswv lug hab.
Thaus muaj tuabneeg has rua Xa‑u, nwg kuj tso dua ib paab moog, mas cov hov kuj cev Vaajtswv lug hab. Xa‑u kuj tso paab kws peb moog hab puab kuj cev Vaajtswv lug lawm hab.

Tes Xa‑u ca le sawv kev moog rua ntawm Lama. Nwg tuaj txug ntawm lub qhov dej luj huv lub moos Xekhu mas nug tas, “Xamuyee hab Tavi nyob hovtwg?” Muaj ib tug teb tas, “Ob tug nyob huv lub zog Nayauj ntawm lub moos Lama.”

Tes Xa‑u txawm tawm hov ntawd moog rua huv Nayauj ntawm lub moos Lama. Mas Vaajtswv tug Ntsuj Plig lug kaav taag nrho nwg lub sab, nwg txawm cev Vaajtswv lug taug kev moog txug Nayauj ntawm lub moos Lama.

Nwg hle nwg tej rwg tsho tseg hab cev Vaajtswv lug rua ntawm Xamuyee xubndag hab pw lab qaab ib nub ib mos hov ntawd. Vem le nuav luas txhad has tas, “Xa‑u yog ib tug xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug hab lov?”

Tavi txawm tswv huv Nayauj ntawm lub moos Lama lug cuag Yaunathaa has tas, “Kuv tau ua le caag? Kuv tau ua txhum daabtsw? Kuv tau ua txhum muaj txem le caag rua koj txwv es nwg yuav nrhav txuv kuv txujsa?”

Yaunathaa teb tas, “Tsw muaj le caag hlo le. Koj yuav tsw tuag hlo le. Kuv txwv tsw ua ib yaam luj los miv kws nwg yuav tsw qha rua kuv paub. Kuv txwv yuav ua caag zais zaaj nuav tsw qha rua kuv? Yeej tsw muaj le hov.”

Kuas Tavi twv tas, “Koj txwv yeej paub zoo tas, koj txaus sab rua kuv heev mas nwg yuav xaav tas, ‘Tsw xob kheev Yaunathaa paub zaaj nuav hlo le tsaam tes nwg ntxhuv sab.’ Muaj Yawmsaub kws muaj txujsa nyob pum hab muaj koj kws muaj txujsa nyob pum, kuv mas tshuav ib qeb xwb tes moog txug qhov tuag.”
Yaunathaa txhad has rua Tavi tas, “Koj has le caag kuv yuav ua lawv le ntawd rua koj.”
Tavi txhad has rua Yaunathaa tas, “Pigkig yog nub kws hli xab, tsw tswm nyog kuv yuav tseg tsw koom noj vaajntxwv lub rooj mov. Ca kuv moog tswv nraim tom teb peb nub txug nub peb tsaus ntuj.
Yog koj txwv pum tas kuv tsw tuaj, thov koj has rua nwg tas, ‘Tavi tub thov kuv tso nwg moog rua nwg lub moos Npelehee lawm vem yog nwg tsev tuabneeg suavdawg ua kevcai xyeem tsaj txwm xyoo.’
Yog nwg has tas, ‘Zoo lauj,’ tes kuv kws yog koj tug qhev yuav tau zoo. Tassws yog nwg chim, koj yuav paub tas nwg yeej txav sab ua phem rua kuv.

Thov koj hlub es koj ua le nuav rua kuv kws yog koj tug qhev, tsua qhov koj tub nrug kuv cog lug sws raug zoo taab meeg Yawmsaub lawm. Tassws yog kuv tau ua txhum thov koj muab kuv tua pov tseg, ua caag koj tseed coj kuv moog cuag koj txwv?”
Yaunathaa has tas, “Thov kuas tsw xob muaj le ntawd hlo le. Yog kuv paub tas kuv txwv txav sab ua phem rua koj, kuv yuav tsw qha koj lov?”
Tavi txhad has rua Yaunathaa tas, “Yog koj txwv teb nyaum kawg leejtwg yuav qha tau rua kuv?”
Yaunathaa has rua Tavi tas, “Ca ib moog rua tom teb.” Ob tug txawm moog rua tom teb.

Mas Yaunathaa has rua Tavi tas, “Muaj Yawmsaub kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv pum, pigkig lossws qos neeg kwvlaam lub swjhawm nuav, thaus kuv tub tshuaj saib kuv txwv lawm, yog nwg lub sab zoo rua koj kuv yuav tsw tso tuabneeg tuaj qha rua koj paub taamswm lov?

Tassws yog kuv txwv npaaj sab ua phem rua koj, mas yog kuv tsw qha rua koj hab tsw xaa koj moog kuas tso sab plhuav, thov Yawmsaub ua ib yaam le ntawd hab nyaav dua rua kuv. Thov Yawmsaub nrug nraim koj yaam le kws nwg nrug nraim kuv txwv.
Yog kuv tseed muaj txujsa nyob ntxwv moog thov koj hlub kuv ruaj khov ib yaam le Yawmsaub txujkev hlub, sub kuv txhad tsw tuag.
Thaus Yawmsaub rhuav tshem Tavi cov yeeb ncuab taag nrho huvsw huv qaab ntuj lawm, thov tsw xob txav koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov ntawm kuv caaj ceg moog ib txhws.”
Yaunathaa txhad nrug Tavi caaj ceg cog lug sws raug zoo, has tas “Thov Yawmsaub pauj taub rua Tavi cov yeeb ncuab.”
Hab Yaunathaa rov kuas Tavi cog lug dua ib zag rua nwg vem yog ob tug muaj kev sws hlub, tsua qhov Yaunathaa hlub Tavi ib yaam le nwg hlub nwg tug kheej.
Tes Yaunathaa txawm has rua Tavi tas, “Pigkig yog nub hli xab, puab yuav pum tas koj tsw nyob koj lub rooj.
Mas qos neeg koj ca le moog rua nraag lub chaw kws koj txeev nraim cev rua nub kws chiv muaj tej xwm txheej nuav, hab nyob ntawm lub pob zeb Exees tog.
Kuv yuav tua peb xub nee rua ib saab ntawd ib yaam le kuv tua phaj.

Kuv yuav khaiv ib tug mivtub has tas, ‘Ca le moog nrhav raab xub.’ Yog kuv has rua tug mivtub hov tas, ‘Saib nawj, raab xub nyob saab tom nuav, ca le muab lug,’ tes koj ca le rov lug, tsua qhov muaj Yawmsaub kws muaj txujsa nyob pum, koj kuj nyob tso sab plhuav, tsw muaj xwm txheej phem daabtsw.
Tassws yog kuv has rua tug mivtub hov tas, ‘Saib nawj, raab xub nyob tom koj hauv ntej u,’ tes koj ca le tswv moog tsua qhov Yawmsaub yog tug xaa koj moog lawm.
Qhov kws koj hab kuv tau has ca hov, mas muaj Yawmsaub ua timkhawv rua kuv hab koj moog ib txhws.”
Tavi txhad tswv nraim tom teb. Thaus txug nub hli xab vaajntxwv lug nyob ntawm rooj mov.
Vaajntxwv nyob sau nwg lub rooj kws npuas ntawm ib saab phaab ntsaa ib yaam le nwg txeev nyob. Yaunathaa sawv ntsug hab Anaw nyob ntawm Xa‑u ib saab. Tassws Tavi lub rooj tsw muaj leejtwg nyob.
Tassws nub ntawd Xa‑u tsw has daabtsw le, tsua qhov nwg xaav tas, “Ntshai yog Tavi khuam cheem tej yaam lawm. Nwg tsw dawb huv, nwg yeej tsw dawb huv kab.”
Tassws nub tom qaab kws hli xab ob Tavi lub rooj kuj tsw muaj leejtwg nyob. Tes Xa‑u txawm has rua nwg tug tub Yaunathaa tas, “Ua caag naag hab nub nua Yexi tug tub tsw tuaj noj mov?”
Yaunathaa txawm teb Xa‑u tas, “Tavi thov thov kuv tso cai rua nwg rov moog rua lub moos Npelehee.

Nwg has tas, ‘Thov tso kuv moog, tsua qhov kuv tsev tuabneeg yuav ua kevcai xyeem tsaj rua huv lub moos, mas kuv tug tijlaug has kuas kuv moog nrug puab koom kuas tau. Yog koj txaus sab rua kuv thov tso kuv moog saib kuv cov tijlaug.’ Yog le hov nwg txhad tsw tau tuaj rua ntawm vaajntxwv lub rooj mov nuav.”

Tes Xa‑u txawm npau tawg rua Yaunathaa hab has rua nwg tas, “Koj yog nam puj kws faav xeeb sab phem le tub, kuv tsw paub lov? Koj tub xaiv Yexi tug tub lug rhuav koj ntsej muag hab ua rua koj nam kws yug koj raug txaaj muag.

Thaus twg Yexi tug tub tseed muaj txujsa nyob huv lub nplajteb, tes koj hab koj caaj ceg yuav tsw raug tsaa ua vaajntxwv nyob ruaj le. Vem le nuav ca le tso tuabneeg moog coj nwg tuaj cuag kuv, nwg yeej yuav tuag xwb.”
Mas Yaunathaa teb nwg txwv Xa‑u tas, “Ua caag Tavi yuav tsum raug muab tua tuag? Nwg tau ua le caag lawm?”
Xa‑u txawm tuab nkaug muv rua Yaunathaa xaav tua nwg. Yog le hov Yaunathaa txhad paub tas nwg txwv txav sab tua Tavi pov tseg lawm.
Yaunathaa txhad sawv tseeg ntawm rooj mov chim quas nyov, hab nwg tsw noj daabtsw hlo le rua nub xab ob hov, tsua qhov nwg txhawj txug Tavi vem nwg txwv tau rhuav Tavi ntsej muag.
Thaus kaaj ntug Yaunathaa txhad moog rua tom teb lawv le teem rua Tavi lawd, muaj ib tug mivtub nrug nwg moog hab.
Nwg has rua tug mivtub hov tas, “Ca le dha moog nrhav raab xub kws kuv tua moog.” Thaus tug mivtub hov dha moog lawd Yaunathaa tua ib raab xub dhau rua tom nwg hauv ntej.
Thaus tug mivtub hov moog txug ntawm raab xub kws Yaunathaa tua hov, Yaunathaa qw rua tug mivtub has tas, “Raab xub nyob dhau tom koj hauv ntej u los tsw yog?”
Hab Yaunathaa qw rua tug mivtub hov tas, “Ca le kawgkag, maaj nroog moog tsw xob tog.” Tug mivtub txawm khaws cov xub hab rov lug rua ntawm Yaunathaa.
Tug mivtub hov tsw paub daabtsw le tsuas yog Yaunathaa hab Tavi paub xwb.
Tes Yaunathaa txawm muab nwg tej cuab yeej rua tug mivtub hov hab has rua nwg tas, “Ca le coj tej nuav moog rua huv lub nroog.”
Thaus tug mivtub hov moog lawm, Tavi txawm tawm ntawm lub pob zeb saab nraag lug khwb nkaus rua huv aav pe peb zag. Tes ob tug sws nwj hab quaj. Tavi quaj heev kawg nkaus.

Yaunathaa has rua Tavi tas, “Ca le moog zoo tsua qhov ib tub tuav Yawmsaub lub npe cog lug twv has tas, Yawmsaub yuav ua timkhawv rua kuv hab koj, hab rua kuv caaj ceg hab koj caaj ceg moog ib txhws.” Tavi txawm sawv kev moog lawm. Yaunathaa rov moog rua huv lub nroog.
Tes Tavi txawm moog txug tug pov thawj Ahimelej huv lub moos Nau. Mas Ahimelej tawm tuaj tog Tavi ua tshee quas nyo has tas, “Ua caag koj yuav tuab leeg tuaj xwb, tsw muaj leejtwg nrug koj tuaj?”

Tavi has rua tug pov thawj Ahimelej tas, “Vaajntxwv khaiv kuv tuaj ua ib yaam num. Nwg has rua kuv tas, ‘Tsw xob qha zaaj kws kuv khaiv koj moog ua hov hab tej kws kuv muab cob rua koj lawd rua leejtwg paub le.’ Kuv tub teem cov tub hluas ntswb kuv dua rua ib qho chaw lawm.
Nwgnuav koj muaj daabtsw ntawm teg? Thov muab tswb lub ncuav lossws ib yaam daabtsw kws koj muaj ntawm nuav rua kuv noj.”
Tug pov thawj teb Tavi tas, “Kuv tsw muaj cov ncuav kws naj nub noj, tsuas yog cov ncuav kws dawb huv xwb. Yuav yog koj cov hluas tsw nrug quaspuj pw txhad noj tau.”

Tavi teb tug pov thawj tas, “Qhov tseeb txhua zag kws kuv tawm moog ua num tej quaspuj yeej nyob deb ntawm peb. Txawm yog peb tawm moog ua tej num tsw tseem ceeb los tej tub hluas lub cev yeej dawb huv lawm. Mas nub nua puab lub cev yimfuab dawb huv.”

Yog le hov tug pov thawj txhad muab cov ncuav dawb huv rua Tavi, vem yog hov ntawd tsw muaj lwm yaam ncuav, tsuas yog cov ncuav kws xyeem txawb rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag xwb, yog cov kws nyav khaws ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag lug es yuav muab cov tshab txawb rua tuab nub ntawd.
Nub ntawd muaj ib tug yawm yog Xa‑u le ib tug qhev nyob hov ntawd, nwg tuaj ua nug rua Yawmsaub. Nwg npe hu ua Ntau‑e, yog tuabneeg Entoo, yog tug thawj kws yug Xa‑u paab yaaj.

Hab Tavi has rua Ahimelej tas, “Koj muaj ib raab ntaaj lossws muv ntawm koj txhais teg los tsw muaj? Tsua qhov kuv tsw coj kuv raab ntaaj lossws tej cuab yeej tuaj hlo le vem vaajntxwv tej num yog num ceev.”

Tug pov thawj has tas, “Kaulia kws yog tuabneeg Filixatee kws koj tua huv lub haav Ela hov raab ntaaj nyob ntawm nuav, tseed qhwv ntaub quas nreeg nyob ntawm lub efauj  saab nrau. Yog koj cheem tsum raab ntaaj ntawd kuj coj moog, tsuas yog muaj tuab raab ntaaj ntawd xwb.” Mas Tavi has tas, “Tsw muaj ib raab ntaaj zoo le raab nuav lawm. Thov muab rua kuv lauj.”
Tes nub ntawd Tavi txawm sawv kev tswv Xa‑u moog cuag vaajntxwv Akhij huv lub moos Ka.

Mas Akhij cov tub teg tub taw has tas, “Tug yawm nuav tsw yog Tavi kws ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws hov lov? Puab tsw tau moog tog hu nkauj seev cev has tas, ‘Xa‑u tua tau quas txheeb leej, Tavi tua tau quas vaam leej,’ lov?”
Tavi kuj khaws tej lug nuav rua huv nwg lub sab hab ntshai vaajntxwv Akhij huv lub moos Ka kawg le.

Nwg txhad txhob txwm ua ib tug nam tsw thooj le qub rua puab pum, nwg ua txuj ua ib tug tuabneeg vwm. Nwg laam sau kis kaaj kis kag rua ntawm tej rooj loog, hab ua qub ncaug nrug quas zwg ntawm tej fwj txwv.
Tes Akhij txhad has rua nwg cov tub teg tub taw tas, “Saib maj, mej tub pum tas tug yawm nuav vwm, mej tseed coj nwg tuaj cuag kuv ua daabtsw?
Kuv tsw muaj tuabneeg vwm lov es mej tseed yuav coj tug yawm nuav tuaj vwm rua ntawm kuv xubndag? Tswm nyog tug yawm nuav tuaj rua huv kuv lub vaaj lub tsev lov?”
Tavi kuj tswv hov ntawd moog nyob huv lub qhov tsua Antulaa. Thaus nwg cov tijlaug hab nwg txwv tsev tuabneeg suavdawg tau nov tej xuv hov puab kuj moog cuag nwg hov ntawd.

Txhua tug kws raug kev txom nyem hab txhua tug kws tshuav nuj tshuav nqe hab txhua tug kws tsw txaus sab kuj sau zog tuaj nrug nwg nyob. Nwg ua puab tug thawj. Muaj tuabneeg tuaj nrug nwg nyob kwvlaam plaub puas leej.

Tavi kuj tawm hov ntawd moog rua lub moos Mixape huv Mau‑a tebchaws. Nwg has rua Mau‑a tug vaajntxwv tas, “Thov ca kuv nam kuv txwv nrug koj nyob moog txug thaus kuv paub tas Vaajtswv yuav ua le caag rua kuv.”
Tes nwg txawm tseg nwg nam nwg txwv nrug Mau‑a tug vaajntxwv nyob mas ob tug nrug vaajntxwv nyob moog taag swjhawm kws Tavi nyob huv lub chaw ruaj khov.
Mas Kab kws yog xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug has rua Tavi tas, “Koj tsw xob nyob huv qhov chaw ruaj khov nuav koj ca le moog rua huv Yuta tebchaws.” Tavi txhad tawm moog nyob lub haav zoov Helej.

Xa‑u nov tas muaj tuabneeg pum Tavi hab cov tuabneeg kws nrug Tavi ua ke. Thaus hov Xa‑u nyob quas tsawg huv lub moos Kinpe‑a huv qaab tsob ntoo tamalis sau lub pov roob tuav rawv raab muv, nwg cov tub teg tub taw suavdawg sawv vej vog nwg.

Xa‑u has rua cov tub teg tub taw kws sawv vej vog nwg tas, “Mej cov tuabneeg Npeeyamee ca le noog kuv has. Yexi tug tub yuav muab teb hab vaaj txwv maab rua mej txhua tug lov? Nwg yuav tsaa mej txhua tug ua thawj kaav ib txheeb leej ib puas leej lov,

mej suavdawg txawm xaav faav xeeb rua kuv? Thaus kuv tug tub nrug Yexi tug tub cog lug sws raug zoo hov tsw muaj leejtwg yuav qha rua kuv paub le. Mej cov tsw muaj ib tug yuav hlub kuv le, hab tsw qha rua kuv paub tas kuv tug tub tshaum kuv tug qhev tawm tsaam kuv, tog nrhw kuv kev yaam le naj nub nwgnuav.”
Ntau‑e kws yog tuabneeg Entoo kws sawv ze Xa‑u cov tub teg tub taw txhad teb tas, “Kuv pum Yexi tug tub tuaj rua ntawm lub moos Nau tuaj cuag Ahithu tug tub Ahimelej,
mas Ahimelej nug Yawmsaub rua nwg hab pub mov rua nwg noj hab pub Kaulia kws yog tuabneeg Filixatee raab ntaaj rua nwg lawm.”

Mas vaajntxwv txawm tso tuabneeg moog hu pov thawj Ahimelej kws yog Ahithu tug tub hab nwg txwv tsev tuabneeg suavdawg kws ua pov thawj huv lub moos Nau kuas tuaj, mas suavdawg txhad tuaj cuag vaajntxwv.
Mas Xa‑u has tas, “Ahithu tug tub ca le noog kuv has.” Nwg teb tas, “Kuv tug tswv kuv nyob ntawm nuav 'os.”

Mas Xa‑u has rua nwg tas, “Ua caag koj yuav nrug Yexi tug tub faav xeeb rua kuv, tsua qhov kws koj muab mov hab ntaaj rua nwg hab nug Vaajtswv rua nwg, mas nwg txhad tawm tsaam kuv tog nrhw kuv yaam le naj nub nwgnuav.”

Mas Ahimelej teb vaajntxwv tas, “Taag nrho koj cov tub teg tub taw sub nyim muaj ib tug twg yuav npuab koj yaam le koj tug vauv Tavi kws ua thawj kaav cov tub rog kws tsom kwm koj hab muaj meej huv koj vaaj koj tsev.

Nub nua yog thawj zag kws kuv thov nug Yawmsaub rua nwg lov? Tsw yog. Thov vaajntxwv tsw xob muab ib yaam daabtsw lug rau txem rua kuv kws yog koj tug qhev lossws rua kuv txwv tsev tuabneeg. Tsua qhov koj tug qhev yeej tsw paub zaaj nuav ib nyuas qhov le tsw has ntau los tsawg.”
Vaajntxwv has rua Ahimelej tas, “Koj yuav tuag tag tag le, koj hab koj txwv tsev tuabneeg suavdawg yuav tuag xwb.”

Mas vaajntxwv has rua cov tub rog kws sawv vej vog nwg tas, “Muab Yawmsaub cov pov thawj nuav tua pov tseg, tsua qhov puab txhais teg nrug Tavi nyob, puab yeej paub tas Tavi tswv lawm kuas puab tsw qha rua kuv paub.” Tassws cov tub teg tub taw tsw kaam nqeg teg tua Yawmsaub cov pov thawj.

Mas vaajntxwv txhad has rua Ntau‑e tas, “Koj ca le nqeg teg tua cov pov thawj.” Mas Ntau‑e kws yog tuabneeg Entoo txhad moog tua cov pov thawj mas nub hov nwg tua cov kws naav lub tsho efauj  ntaub maag yim caum tswb leeg.
Nwg xuas ntaaj tua lub moos Nau kws yog cov pov thawj lub moos, tsw has quaspuj quasyawg hab tej mivnyuas yau hab mivnyuas kws noj mig hab tej nyuj tej neeg luav hab tej yaaj huvsw.
Tassws Ahimelej ib tug tub kws yog Ahithu xeeb ntxwv hu ua Anpiyatha tswv dim hab lawv Tavi qaab moog.
Mas Anpiyatha has rua Tavi tas, “Xa‑u muab Yawmsaub cov pov thawj tua taag lawm.”

Tavi has rua Anpiyatha tas, “Nub hov thaus Ntau‑e kws yog tuabneeg Entoo nyob hov ntawd kuv yeej paub tas nwg yuav qha rua Xa‑u xwb xwb le. Yog tim kuv mas koj txwv tsev tuabneeg suavdawg txhad le tuag.
Ca le nrug kuv nyob tsw xob ntshai le tsua qhov yog tug kws xaav tua koj los kuj xaav tua kuv hab. Koj ca le nrug kuv nyob txhad le tso sab plhuav.”
Puab has rua Tavi tas, “Saib maj, cov Filixatee saamswm ua rog rua lub moos Khe‑ila hab lws tej qoob loos kws ntaus taag rua huv tshaav lawm.”
Tavi txawm nug Yawmsaub tas, “Kuv yuav moog ntaus cov Filixatee hov los tsw moog?” Yawmsaub has rua Tavi tas, “Ca le moog ntaus cov Filixatee hov hab paab cawm lub moos Khe‑ila kuas dim.”

Tassws Tavi cov tuabneeg has rua Tavi tas, “Peb nyob huv Yuta nuav peb tub ntshai kawg le lawm. Yog peb tseed moog rua Khe‑ila es ua rog rua Filixatee cov tub rog hab, mas peb yuav yimfuab ntshai heev kaj.”
Tes Tavi txhad rov nug Yawmsaub dua mas Yawmsaub teb nwg tas, “Ca le sawv tseeg moog lawm nraag Khe‑ila ntaag, tsua qhov kuv yuav muab cov Filixatee rua huv koj txhais teg.”

Mas Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg txhad le moog nraag Khe‑ila, moog ua rog rua cov Filixatee, txeeb puab tej tsaj txhu rov lug hab tua cov Filixatee tuag coob kawg le. Ua le nuav Tavi txhad paab tau cov tuabneeg Khe‑ila dim.
Mas thaus kws Ahimelej tug tub Anpiyatha tswv moog cuag Tavi huv lub moos Khe‑ila hov, nwg nqaa lub efauj  moog hab.

Muaj tuabneeg moog has rua Xa‑u tas Tavi tuaj rua ntawm Khe‑ila lawm, mas Xa‑u txawm has tas, “Vaajtswv muab nwg rua huv kuv txhais teg lawm, tsua qhov nwg tub nkaag moog rua huv lub moos kws muaj rooj loog hab muaj laag rooj kaw huvsw, kuj yog nwg muab nwg kaw ca rua huv.”
Xa‑u txhad hu taag nrho nwg cov tub rog tuaj moog ua rog, kuas puab moog nraag Khe‑ila moog vej puav Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg.
Tavi paub tas Xa‑u ntaus tswvyim phem rua nwg, nwg txhad has rua pov thawj Anpiyatha tas, “Coj lub efauj  lug ntawm nuav.”
Tavi txhad has tas, “Au Yawmsaub kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv, kuv kws yog koj tub qhe tau nov tseeb tas Xa‑u nrhav kev tuaj rua Khe‑ila ua kuas lub moos nuav puam tsuaj vem yog tim kuv.

Mas cov tuabneeg Khe‑ila yuav muab kuv cob rua huv Xa‑u txhais teg lov? Xa‑u yuav tuaj lawv le kws kuv kws yog koj tug tub qhe tau nov lov? Au Yawmsaub kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv, thov koj has rua kuv kws yog koj tug tub qhe paub lauj.” Mas Yawmsaub has tas, “Nwg yuav tuaj tag.”
Tavi txhad has tas, “Cov tuabneeg Khe‑ila yuav muab kuv hab kuv cov tuabneeg cob rua huv Xa‑u txhais teg lov?” Mas Yawmsaub has tas, “Puab yuav muab mej cob rua tag.”

Mas Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg muaj kwvlaam rau pua leej txhad sawv tseeg tswv tawm huv Khe‑ila lawm puab kuj moog le kws puab moog tau. Thaus muaj tuabneeg moog has rua Xa‑u tas Tavi tub tswv tawm huv Khe‑ila lawm, Xa‑u kuj tseg tsw moog lawm.
Tavi nyob rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua huv tej qhov chaw kws ruaj khov peg toj sab huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Xi. Mas Xa‑u naj nub nrhav Tavi tassws Vaajtswv tsw muab Tavi rua huv Xa‑u txhais teg.
Thaus Tavi pum tas Xa‑u tawm tuaj nrhav txuv nwg txujsa, nwg nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Xi ntawm Haulej.
Mas Xa‑u tug tub Yaunathaa sawv tseeg moog cuag Tavi ntawm Haulej hab txhawb nwg tug zug kuas muaj zug rua huv Vaajtswv.

Nwg has rua Tavi tas, “Tsw xob ntshai, kuv txwv Xa‑u txhais teg yuav ua tsw tau le caag rua koj. Koj yuav tau ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixayee, kuv yuav ua koj tug tim xyoob. Kuv txwv Xa‑u yeej paub le nuav lawm.”
Yaunathaa hab Tavi ob tug txhad cog lug sws raug zoo taab meeg Yawmsaub. Tavi tseed nyob ntawm Haulej, Yaunathaa rov qaab moog tsev.

Cov tuabneeg Xi moog has rua Xa‑u ntawm Kinpe‑a tas, “Tavi tswv nraim rua huv plawv peb moog nyob huv lub chaw ruaj khov ntawm Haulej, sau lub ncov roob Hakhila kws nyob nraag qaab moos Yesimoo los maj.
Au vaajntxwv, ca le tuaj lawv le koj sab xaav tes peb cov yuav muab nwg cob rua huv koj txhais teg ntaag.”
Mas Xa‑u has tas, “Thov Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua mej tsua qhov mej taab ncuab kuv.
Ca le moog tshuaj saib zoo zoo kuas paub tas nwg nyob qhov twg hab leejtwg pum nwg hov ntawd, tsua qhov muaj tuabneeg has rua kuv tas nwg ntse heev.

Vem le nuav ua tuab zoo moog tshuaj saib txhua qhov kws nwg nkaum le rov qaab lug qha tseeb tseeb rua kuv. Mas kuv le nrug mej moog. Yog nwg tseed nyob huv lub tebchaws kuv yuav tshawb nrhav nwg huv txhua cum Yuta.”
Puab txhad sawv kev ua Xa‑u ntej moog rua nraag Xi. Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Ma‑oo kws nyob huv Alanpa nraag qaab moos Yesimoo.

Xa‑u hab nwg cov tub rog kuj moog nrhav Tavi. Muaj tuabneeg qha rua Tavi, mas Tavi txhad tswv moog rua nraag lub pob tsuas hab nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Ma‑oo. Thaus Xa‑u nov le hov nwg txhad lawv Tavi qaab rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Ma‑oo.

Xa‑u moog txug ib saab roob, Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg moog dua rua ib saab roob. Tavi kuj maaj nroog tswv Xa‑u tsua qhov Xa‑u hab nwg cov tub rog tuaj ze Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg lawm yuav nteg nwg.
Tassws muaj ib tug xaa xuv tuaj has rua Xa‑u tas, “Ca le leej maaj rov qaab vem yog cov Filixatee txhwj rog tuaj lws lub tebchaws lawm.”
Xa‑u txhad tseg tsw lawv Tavi rov qaab moog ua rog rua cov Filixatee. Puab txhad hu qhov chaw ntawd has tas Roob Zeb Ncaim Kev.
Mas Tavi txhad tawm hov ntawd moog nyob tej chaw ruaj khov huv Eekenti.
Thaus Xa‑u moog lawv cov Filixatee rov qaab lug, muaj tuabneeg has rua nwg tas, “Tavi nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Eekenti.”
Tes Xa‑u txawm xaiv peb txheeb leej tub rog huv cov Yixayee suavdawg coj moog nrhav Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg rua ntawm Roob Tsuas Sai.

Xa‑u tuaj txug ib lub nkuaj yaaj ntawm ntug kev. Muaj ib lub qhov tsua nyob hov ntawd tes Xa‑u txawm moog tawm rooj rua huv. Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg kuj nyob huv lub qhov tsua hov tom qhov kawg nkaus.

Tavi cov tuabneeg has rua Tavi tas, “Nub nua yog nub kws Yawmsaub has rua koj tas, ‘Kuv muab koj tug yeeb ncuab cob rua huv koj txhais teg, mas koj yuav ua rua nwg lawv le koj pum zoo.’ ” Mas Tavi sawv nyaag tuabywv moog txav Xa‑u lub qaab tsho.
Dhau ntawd Tavi kuj tu sab tsua qhov kws nwg txav Xa‑u lub qaab tsho.

Tavi txhad has rua nwg cov tuabneeg tas, “Thov Yawmsaub taav tsw xob kheev kuv tsaa teg tawm tsaam le nuav rua kuv tug tswv kws Yawmsaub tsaa ca lawd, tsua qhov nwg yog tug kws Yawmsaub laub roj tsaa ca.”
Tavi kuj has tej lug nuav cheem nwg cov tuabneeg, nwg tsw kheev puab ntaus Xa‑u. Xa‑u kuj sawv tseeg tawm huv qhov tsua taug kev moog lawm.
Dhau ntawd Tavi kuj sawv tseeg tawm huv qhov tsua moog hab hu rua Xa‑u tas, “Au vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv.” Thaus Xa‑u tig lug saib, Tavi txawm khoov ntshws rua huv cov aav pe.
Tavi has rua Xa‑u tas, “Ua caag koj yuav noog tej lug kws cov tuabneeg has tas, ‘Tavi nrhav kev yuav txuv koj’?

Saib maj, nub nua koj qhov muag tub pum tseeb lawm tas Yawmsaub muab koj cob rua huv kuv txhais teg huv lub qhov tsua nuav. Muaj qee leej has kuas kuv muab koj tua pov tseg, tassws kuv tseg koj txujsa ca. Kuv has tas, ‘Kuv yuav tsw tsaa teg tawm tsaam kuv tug tswv, tsua qhov nwg yog tug kws Yawmsaub laub roj tsaa ca lawm.’

Kuv txwv, koj ca le saib koj lub qaab tsho kws nyob huv kuv txhais teg nuav. Qhov kws kuv txav koj lub qaab tsho tassws kuv tsw tua koj, mas koj ca le paub hab pum tas kuv txhais teg tsw tau ua txhum hab tsw faav xeeb rua koj. Txawm yog koj lawv kuv yuav txuv kuv txujsa los kuv tsw tau ua txhum rua koj.
Thov Yawmsaub txav txem rua kuv hab koj saib leejtwg txhum. Qhov kws koj ua txhum rua kuv, thov Yawmsaub ua pauj rua koj. Kuv txhais teg yuav tsw ua ib yaam daabtsw rua koj.
Ib yaam le tej laug has paaj lug tas, ‘Kev phem yeej tawm huv tuabneeg phem lug,’ tassws kuv txhais teg yuav tsw ua ib yaam daabtsw rua koj.
Cov Yixayee tug vaajntxwv tawm tuaj lawv leejtwg? Koj tuaj caum leejtwg? Caum tug dev kws tuag lawd, caum tug dev mub xwb.
Vem le nuav thov Yawmsaub tu plaub hab txav txem rua kuv hab koj. Thov nwg tshuaj saib hab has kuv tshaaj plaub hab cawm kuv dim huv koj txhais teg.”
Thaus Tavi has tej lug nuav rua Xa‑u taag lawd, Xa‑u has tas, “Kuv tug tub Tavi 'e, ntawm kod yog koj lub suab tag lov?” Xa‑u txawm tsaa suab hlo quaj.
Nwg has rua Tavi tas, “Koj ua ncaaj dua kuv, vem koj ua qhov zoo pauj kuv, tassws kuv ua qhov phem pauj koj.
Koj tub pav nub nua has tas koj ua zoo le caag rua kuv, koj tsw tua kuv txujsa rua thaus Yawmsaub muab kuv cob rua huv koj txhais teg.
Yog leejtwg ntswb nwg tug yeeb ncuab, nwg yuav tso tug yeeb ncuab dim dawb tso sab plhuav lov? Yog le nuav thov Yawmsaub ua zoo rua koj pauj qhov kws nub nua koj tau ua zoo rua kuv.
Nwgnuav kuv paub tseeb tas koj yuav tau ua vaajntxwv tag tag le hab cov Yixayee lub tebchaws yuav raug muab rua huv koj txhais teg kaav moog le.
Yog le nuav ca le tuav Yawmsaub lub npe cog lug twv rua kuv tas thaus kuv tuag lawd koj yuav tsw txav kuv caaj ceg pov tseg hab koj yuav tsw rhuav kuv lub npe kuas pluj huv kuv txwv caaj ceg.”
Tavi kuj cog lug twv rua Xa‑u le ntawd tes Xa‑u txawm rov moog tsev, tassws Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg nce moog rua huv lub chaw ruaj khov.
Tes Xamuyee txawm tuag. Cov Yixayee suavdawg tuaj ua ke quaj ntsuag hab muab nwg log ntawm nwg lub tsev huv lub moos Lama. Tavi txawm sawv kev moog rua nraag tebchaws moj saab qhua Palaa.
Muaj ib tug yawm nyob huv lub moos Ma‑oo muaj num ntawm lub moos Khamee. Tug yawm hov nplua nuj heev, nwg muaj peb txheeb tug yaaj hab ib txheeb tug tshws. Nwg saamswm txav plaub yaaj huv Khamee.
Tug yawm hov npe hu ua Nanpaa, nwg tug quaspuj hu ua Anpikayi. Tug quaspuj hov ntse heev hab zoo nkauj, tassws tug quasyawg hov mas tswv ncauj tswv lug hab cuam khum. Nwg yog Khalej caaj ceg.
Tavi nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua nov tas Nanpaa saamswm txav plaub yaaj.
Tavi txhad khaiv kaum tug tub hluas hab has rua cov hluas hov tas, “Ca le moog rua huv lub moos Khamee moog cuag Nanpaa hab coj kuv le lug moog has rua nwg.
Mej ca le has tej lug nuav rua nwg tas, ‘Koj hab koj tsev tuabneeg tsuas muaj kws noj qaab nyob zoo, txhua yaam kws yog koj le tsuas muaj kws noj qaab nyob zoo.
Kuv nov tas koj muaj tuabneeg txav plaub yaaj. Koj cov tuabneeg txav plaub yaaj nrug peb nyob, hab peb tsw tau ua phem rua puab le hab puab tsw tu ncua ib yaam daabtsw rua thaus puab nyob huv Khamee.

Koj nug koj cov hluas hov, puab yuav qha rua koj. Vem le nuav thov koj hlub kuv cov hluas tsua qhov peb tuaj rua nub kws paam noj paam haus. Thov koj pub tej kws koj muaj ntawm teg rua peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe hab pub rua koj tug tub Tavi.’ ”
Thaus Tavi cov tub hluas tuaj txug puab kuj has Tavi cov lug hov rua Nanpaa, tes puab txawm nyob tog.
Nanpaa teb Tavi cov hluas tas, “Tavi yog leejtwg? Yexi tug tub yog leejtwg? Ntu nuav tej qhev tswv ntawm puab tug lospaav coob heev.
Tswm nyog kuv yuav muab kuv tej ncuav tej dej hab tej nqaj kws kuv tua rua kuv cov tuabneeg txav plaub yaaj noj pub rua cov tuabneeg kws tuaj hovtwg tuaj kuv tsw paub lov?”
Tavi cov tub hluas txawm tig hlo rov lug hab pav tej hov huvsw rua Tavi.

Tavi txhad has rua nwg cov tuabneeg tas, “Txhua tug ca le rws ntaaj ntawm duav.” Tes txhua tug txawm rws ntaaj. Tavi kuj rws ntaaj hab. Muaj tuabneeg nrug Tavi moog kwvlaam plaub puas leej, tseg ob puas leej zuv tej nraa.

Muaj ib tug tub hluas moog has rua Anpikayi kws yog Nanpaa tug quaspuj tas, “Saib nawj, Tavi tso tuabneeg xaa xuv huv tebchaws moj saab qhua tuaj has lug zoo rua peb tug lospaav, tassws nwg ua nyaum heev rua puab.
Cov tuabneeg hov txeev ua zoo rua peb ntau heev. Peb tsw raug xwm txheej phem daabtsw le hab peb tsw tu ncua ib yaam daabtsw rua thaus peb nrug puab nyob huv tshaav zaub.
Puab zoo yaam nkaus le lub ntsaa loog thaiv peb nruab nub mo ntuj taag txhua lub swjhawm kws peb nrug puab nyob yug yaaj.

Nwgnuav thov koj paub zaaj nuav hab xaav saib koj yuav tsum ua le caag, tsua qhov puab yeej txav sab yuav ua nruj ua tswv rua peb tug lospaav lawm hab ua rua nwg tsev tuabneeg huvsw lawm. Peb tug lospaav yog tuabneeg tswv ncauj tswv lug leejtwg has tsw tau le.”

Tes Anpikayi txawm maaj nroog muab ob puas lub ncuav hab ob lub naab tawv cawv txwv maab hab tswb tug yaaj le nqaj kws npaaj tau lawd hab tswb xe‑a  qeb kib hab ib puas rev txwv maab qhuav hab ob puas daim ncuav txwv cua rua neeg luav thauj.
Nwg has rua nwg cov tub qhe tas, “Ca le ua ntej moog kuv yuav lawv mej qaab.” Tassws nwg tsw qha rua nwg tug quasyawg Nanpaa paub.
Thaus nwg caij neeg luav tuaj muaj ib lub roob thaiv lawm, Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg kuj taug kev tuaj mas Anpikayi ntswb nthaav puab.

Tavi tub has ca lawm tas, “Kuv tub zuv tug yawm hov txhua yaam huv tebchaws moj saab qhua dawb dawb xwb. Nwg tej hov txhua chaw tsw pluj ib yaam daabtsw le, los nwg tseed ua phem pauj kuv tej kev zoo.
Yog pigkig sawv ntxuv kuv tseed tseg nwg cov tuabneeg ib tug txwvneej caj sa, kuj thov Vaajtswv ua ib yaam le ntawd hab nyaav dua rua kuv.”
Thaus Anpikayi pum dheev Tavi, nwg nqeg plhawv sau neeg luav lug hab pe khwb ti nkaus aav rua ntawm Tavi xubndag.
Nwg pe ntawm Tavi kwtaw hab has tas, “Yawm hlub, lub txem nuav ca kuv ib leeg rws. Thov ca koj tug nkauj qhev pav rua koj noog, thov koj noog kuv kws yog koj tug nkauj qhev tej lug.

Thov koj kws yog kuv tug tswv tsw xob quav ntsej Nanpaa kws tswv ncauj tswv lug hov. Nwg phim nkaus nwg lub npe kws hu ua Nanpaa  nwg txhad le ruag. Tassws kuv kws yog koj tug nkauj qhev tsw pum cov tub hluas kws koj khaiv tuaj hov.

“Vem le nuav, yawm hlub, muaj Yawmsaub kws muaj txujsa nyob pum hab muaj koj kws muaj txujsa nyob pum, Yawmsaub tswj tsw kheev koj ua txhum kws tsaa koj txhais teg pauj taub ua rua lwm tug lug ntshaav, vem le nuav thov ca koj cov yeeb ncuab hab cov kws nrhav kev ua phem rua koj raug ib yaam le Nanpaa.
Tej kws koj tug qhev coj tuaj pub rua koj kws yog kuv tug tswv nuav, thov muab rua cov hluas kws nrug koj ua ke.

Thov zaam txem rua koj tug qhev lauj. Yawmsaub yeej yuav ua kuv tug tswv caaj ceg kuas nyob ruaj khov vem yog koj ua rog rua Yawmsaub tej yeeb ncuab, mas thaus koj tseed muaj txujsa nyob yuav nrhav tsw tau ib qho kev txhum nyob huv koj.

Yog muaj tuabneeg sawv tseeg lawv txuv koj txujsa los koj txujsa yuav raug muab khi nkaus nrug cov kws muaj txujsa nyob ua ke rua Yawmsaub kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv tsom kwm. Tassws koj cov yeeb ncuab txujsa yuav raug muab laim pov tseg ib yaam le lub qai zeb kws raug muab laim tawm huv txuj hlua fav.
Thaus Yawmsaub ua lawv le txhua yaam zoo kws nwg tau has ca rua koj lawm hab tsaa koj ua tug thawj kaav hlo cov Yixayee,

yuav tsw muaj ib yaam daabtsw ua rua kuv tug tswv ntxhuv sab nyuaj sab tsua qhov kws koj tau ua rua tej tuabneeg tsw txhum lug ntshaav hab koj pauj taub koj ib leeg. Thaus Yawmsaub ua zoo rua kuv tug tswv lawd, thov koj ncu txug kuv kws yog koj tug nkauj qhev hab.”
Tavi txhad has rua Anpikayi tas, “Qhuas Yawmsaub kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv kws khaiv koj tuaj ntswb kuv nub nua.

Thov ca koj txujkev ntse tau moov zoo hab thov kuas koj tug kheej tau koob moov tsua qhov nub nua koj tau tswj tsw kheev kuv ua txhum kws tsaa kuv txhais teg pauj taub kuv ib leeg ua rua lwm tug lug ntshaav.

Muaj Yawmsaub kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv muaj txujsa nyob pum, nwg yog tug kws tswj kuv tsw pub kuv ua phem rua koj. Yog koj tsw tau maaj nroog tuaj ntswb kuv, pigkig sawv ntxuv yeej yuav tsw tshuav ib tug txwvneej rua Nanpaa hlo le.”
Tes Tavi txawm txais txhua yaam kws Anpikayi coj tuaj hab has rua nwg tas, “Ca le rov qaab moog zoo rua koj vaaj koj tsev lauj. Kuv tub noog koj tej lug hab kuv yuav ua lawv le kws koj thov kuv.”

Anpikayi txawm rov moog rua ntawm Nanpaa, ua cav nwg saamswm noj haus luj huv tsev yaam nkaus le tej vaajntxwv noj. Nanpaa kuj zoo sab heev vem nwg qaug cawv heev. Mas Anpikayi tsw has daabtsw rua nwg paub moog txug taagkig kaaj ntug.
Taagkig sawv ntxuv thaus cawv txwv maab xaam taag huv Nanpaa lawm, nwg tug quaspuj le pav tej xwm txheej hov rua nwg noog, tes nwg lub plawv ca le tsw ua num, nwg zoo le lub pob zeb lawm.
Nyob tau kwvlaam kaum nub Yawmsaub ua rua Nanpaa tuag lawm.

Thaus Tavi nov tas Nanpaa tuag lawm nwg txawm has tas, “Qhuas Yawmsaub kws pauj taub qhov kws Nanpaa saib tsw taug kuv, hab tswj tsw kheev kuv ua phem. Yawmsaub pauj qhov kws Nanpaa ua phem kuas poob rov rua sau nwg taubhau.” Tes Tavi txawm tso tuabneeg moog has Anpikayi kuas lug ua nwg le quaspuj.
Thaus Tavi cov tub teg tub taw tuaj txug Anpikayi huv lub moos Khamee, puab has rua nwg tas, “Tavi khaiv peb tuaj coj koj moog ua nwg quaspuj.”
Anpikayi txawm sawv tseeg khoov ntshws rua huv aav hab has tas, “Saib maj, kuv kws yog mej tug nkauj qhev zoo sab ua qhev ntxuav kuv tug tswv tej tub qhe kwtaw.”
Anpikayi kuj maaj nroog sawv tseeg caij ib tug neeg luav hab nwg tswb tug nkauj qhev nrug Tavi cov tuabneeg moog txhad tau moog ua Tavi quaspuj.
Tavi kuj yuav Ahinau‑aa kws yog tuabneeg huv lub moos Yile‑ee hab. Mas ob tug ua Tavi quaspuj.
Xa‑u muab nwg tug ntxhais Mikhaa kws yog Tavi quaspuj qua ib tom rua La‑i tug tub Pati huv lub moos Kaali lawm.
Cov tuabneeg huv lub moos Xi tuaj has rua Xa‑u huv lub moos Kinpe‑a tas, “Tavi tswv nraim sau lub roob Hakhila kws ncaaj lub moos Yesimoo.”
Tes Xa‑u txawm sawv tseeg moog rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Xi, hab tej tub rog kws nwg xaiv ca lawd peb txheeb leej nrug nwg moog nrhav Tavi huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Xi.
Xa‑u ua yeej rua ntawm ntug kev sau lub roob Hakhila kws ncaaj lub moos Yesimoo. Tassws Tavi nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua. Thaus nwg paub tas Xa‑u tuaj nrhav nwg huv tebchaws moj saab qhua,
nwg txawm tso tuabneeg moog tshuaj saib txhad paub tas Xa‑u tuaj lawm tag.

Tes Tavi txawm sawv tseeg moog rua ntawm lub chaw kws Xa‑u ua yeej nyob, hab Tavi pum lub chaw kws Xa‑u hab tug thawj rog Anaw kws yog Naw tug tub pw. Xa‑u pw rua huv plawv yeej hab nwg cov tub rog ua chaw nyob vej ib ncig nwg.

Mas Tavi has rua Ahimelej kws yog tuabneeg Hithai hab has rua Anpisai kws yog Xeluya tug tub hab yog Yau‑a tug kwv has tas, “Leejtwg yuav nrug kuv nqeg moog rua huv Xa‑u lub yeej?” Mas Anpisai has tas, “Kuv yuav nrug koj moog.”

Tes mo ntawd Tavi hab Anpisai txawm moog rua huv Xa‑u cov tub rog. Ua cav Xa‑u pw tsaug zug huv plawv lub yeej, nwg raab muv rhais rua huv aav ntawm nwg taubhau. Anaw hab cov tub rog pw vej puag ncig Xa‑u.
Anpisai has rua Tavi tas, “Nub nua Yawmsaub muab koj tug yeeb ncuab cob rua huv koj txhais teg lawm. Nwgnuav ca kuv xuas muv nkaug ib muv teem nkaus rua huv aav xwb tsw txug nkaug ob zag.”
Tassws Tavi has rua Anpisai tas, “Tsw xob txuv nwg hlo le, tsua qhov leejtwg yuav tsaa teg tawm tsaam tug kws Yawmsaub laub roj tsaa ca lawd es tsw txhum?”
Hab Tavi has tas, “Muaj Yawmsaub kws muaj txujsa nyob pum, Yawmsaub yeej yuav tua nwg, lossws nwg yuav tuag vem yog lub caij tuag lossws nwg yuav moog ua rog le tuag.
Thov Yawmsaub taav tsw xob kheev kuv tsaa teg tawm tsaam tug kws Yawmsaub tsaa ca lawd. Nwgnuav ca le muab nwg raab muv ntawm nwg taubhau hab lub taub dej es ib moog.”

Tavi txawm muab raab muv hab lub taub dej ntawm Xa‑u taubhau tes ob tug txawm moog lawm tsw muaj leejtwg pum tsw muaj leejtwg paub le, tsw muaj ib tug tswm, tsua qhov puab txhua tug tsaug zug heev vem yog Yawmsaub ua rua puab tuaj daab ndub heev.
Tes Tavi txawm hlaa moog rua saab tim u, moog sawv sau lub ncov roob deb deb, muaj ib lub haav quas.
Tavi hu nrov nrov rua cov tub rog hab rua Anaw kws yog Naw tug tub has tas, “Anaw 'e, koj tsw teb lov?” Anaw teb tas, “Leejtwg hu vaajntxwv nej?”

Tavi teb Anaw tas, “Koj tsw yog txwvneej lov? Huv cov Yixayee leejtwg zoo le koj? Ua caag koj tsw zuv vaajntxwv kws yog koj tug tswv tuab zoo? Tsua qhov muaj ib tug nkaag moog yuav tua vaajntxwv kws yog koj tug tswv.

Qhov kws koj ua le nuav tsw zoo hlo le. Muaj Yawmsaub kws muaj txujsa nyob pum, koj mas tswm nyog tuag lauj vem koj tsw zuv koj tug tswv tuab zoo, yog tug kws Yawmsaub laub roj tsaa ca. Nwgnuav tshuaj saib vaajntxwv raab muv hab lub taub dej ntawm nwg taubhau dua twg lawm.”
Xa‑u cim tau Tavi lub suab nwg txhad has tas, “Kuv tug tub Tavi 'e, nuav yog koj lub suab ntaag lov?” Tavi teb tas, “Au vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv, yog kuv lub suab ntaag lauj.”
Hab nwg has tas, “Ua caag kuv tug tswv yuav lawv kuv kws yog koj tug qhev? Kuv tau ua le caag? Kuv txhais teg tau ua txhum daabtsw?

Nwgnuav thov vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv noog kuv kws yog koj tug qhev tej lug. Yog Yawmsaub tshaum koj lub sab ua kuas koj tawm tsaam kuv, thov ca Yawmsaub txais yuav tej hov txhua chaw kws muab xyeem. Tassws yog tuabneeg tshaum koj nua tes thov ca puab raug foom tsw zoo rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag. Nub nua puab tau lawv kuv tawm kuv txhad tsw muaj feem tau Yawmsaub qub txeeg qub teg hab puab has tas, ‘Ca le moog ua koom rua luas tej daab.’
Vem le nuav nwgnuav thov tsw xob ca kuv tej ntshaav poob deb ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag. Cov Yixayee tug vaajntxwv tawm tuaj nrhav tuab tug dev mub txujsa, yaam le tug kws moog lawv yij sau roob.”

Tes Xa‑u has tas, “Kuv tau ua txhum lawm lauj. Kuv tug tub Tavi, ca le rov qaab lug, kuv yuav tsw ua phem rua koj dua le lawm, tsua qhov nub nua koj saib kuv txujsa tswm txaj. Kuv ua zoo nkaus le tej tuabneeg ruag xwb hab ua txhum luj kawg le.”
Mas Tavi teb tas, “Au vaajntxwv, koj raab muv nyob ntawm nuav. Koj ca le khaiv ib tug hluas tuaj coj rov qaab moog.

Yawmsaub pub nqe zug rua txhua tug lawv le puab txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab qhov kws puab lub sab xwb rua Yawmsaub. Nub nua Yawmsaub muab koj cob rua huv kuv txhais teg lawm kuas kuv tsw tsaa kuv txhais teg tawm tsaam tug kws Yawmsaub laub roj tsaa ca lawd.
Nub nua kuv saib koj txujsa tswm txaj le caag, kuj thov Yawmsaub saib kuv txujsa tswm txaj ib yaam le ntawd, hab thov Yawmsaub cawm kuv dim huv txhua txujkev ceblaaj ntxhuv sab.”
Tes Xa‑u has rua Tavi tas, “Kuv tug tub Tavi, thov Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua koj. Koj yuav ua tau ntau yaam hab ua kuas tav.” Tavi txawm moog lawm, Xa‑u rov qaab moog tsev.

Tavi xaav huv lub sab tas, “Muaj ib nub twg ntshai kuv yuav tuag rua Xa‑u txhais teg xwb. Qhov zoo tshaaj tes ca kuv tswv moog nyob huv cov Filixatee tebchaws, Xa‑u txhad tsw muaj sab nrhav kuv huv Yixayee tebchaws hab kuv txhad dim nwg txhais teg.”
Tavi txawm sawv tseeg coj rau pua leej kws nrug nwg ua ke tswv hlaa moog cuag Ma‑au tug tub Akhij kws ua vaajntxwv huv lub moos Ka.

Mas Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg ua ke hab puab txhua tsev tuabneeg kuj nrug Akhij nyob huv lub moos Ka. Tavi ob tug quaspuj yog Ahinau‑aa kws yog tuabneeg Yile‑ee, hab Anpikayi kws yog Nanpaa huv Khamee tug quaspuj kws ua puj ntsuag lawm, moog hab.
Thaus muaj tuabneeg moog has rua Xa‑u tas Tavi tswv moog rua lub moos Ka lawm, Xa‑u txawm tsw nrhav Tavi le lawm.
Tavi txhad has rua Akhij tas, “Yog koj txaus sab rua kuv mas thov koj muab ib qho chaw huv tej zej zog rua kuv nyob. Ua caag yuav ca koj tug qhev nrug koj nyob huv vaajntxwv lub nroog nuav?”
Tes nub hov Akhij txawm muab lub moos Xilaj pub rua nwg. Xilaj txhad poob ua vaajntxwv Yuta le moos lug txug naj nub nwgnuav.
Lub swjhawm kws Tavi moog nyob huv cov Filixatee tebchaws hov yog ib xyoos hab plaub lub hlis.

Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg kuj moog ntaus cov tuabneeg Kesu, cov tuabneeg Kexaw hab cov Amalej kws yog cov qub tuabneeg kws ib txwm nyob huv lub tebchaws hov, ntaus moog txug lub moos Su moog txug ncua Iyi tebchaws.
Tavi ntaus lub tebchaws hov tsw tseg tej txwvneej tej quaspuj caj sa le, hab txeeb tej yaaj tej nyuj tej neeg luav tej ntxhuav tej tsoog tsho le rov lug rua Akhij.
Thaus Akhij nug tas “Nub nua koj moog lws leejtwg lug?” Tavi teb tas “Moog lws Neke kws yog Yuta le,” lossws “Moog lws Neke kws yog cov Yelame‑ee le,” lossws “Moog lws Neke kws yog cov Khenai le.”

Tavi yeej tsw tseg quasyawg quaspuj sav le tsw tso ib tug lug rua huv lub moos Ka le, nwg xaav tas, “Tsaam tes puab yuav has txug peb cov tas Tavi tau ua le u le nuav.” Nuav yog tej kws nwg pheej ua taag lub swjhawm kws nwg nyob huv cov Filixatee tebchaws.
Akhij tso sab rua Tavi, nwg xaav tas, “Tavi tub ua rua cov Yixayee kws yog nwg haiv tuabneeg ntxub nwg kawg. Vem le nuav nwg yuav ua tau kuv tug qhev ib swm neej.”
Thaus ntawd cov Filixatee sau tub rog yuav moog ua rog rua cov Yixayee. Mas Akhij has rua Tavi tas, “Koj yuav tsum paub tas koj hab koj cov tuabneeg yuav tau nrug kuv tawm moog ua rog.”
Tavi has rua Akhij tas, “Zoo kawg, koj yuav paub tas kuv kws yog koj tug qhev muaj peevxwm le caag.” Akhij has rua Tavi tas, “Zoo lawm, kuv yuav tsaa koj ua tug kws fwj xwm kuv moog taag swm neej.”
Xamuyee tub tuag lawm hab cov Yixayee suavdawg quaj ntsuag nwg hab muab nwg log rua huv Lama kws yog nwg lub moos. Xa‑u tub rhuav tshem tej txwv neeb txwv yaig huv lub tebchaws taag lawm.
Cov Filixatee sau zog tuaj ua ke ua yeej ze ntawm lub moos Sunee. Mas Xa‑u txhwj Yixayee cov tub rog suavdawg tuaj ua yeej rua sau lub roob Kinpau‑a.
Thaus Xa‑u pum Filixatee cov tub rog mas nwg ntshai heev, nwg lub sab tshee quas nyo.
Thaus Xa‑u ua nug rua Yawmsaub, Yawmsaub kuj tsw teb nwg, tsw has teb huv npau suav lossws teb ntawm Uli lossws ntawm cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug.

Xa‑u txhad has rua nwg cov tub teg tub taw tas, “Ca le moog nrhav ib tug puj kws txawj ua neeb es kuv yuav moog kuas nwg ua neeb saib.” Xa‑u cov tub teg tub taw has tas, “Muaj ib tug quaspuj ua txwv neeb huv lub moos Eentau.”

Xa‑u txhad hloov nwg tsoog tsho ua cuav nrug ob tug txwvneej moog. Puab moog txug tug quaspuj hov rua thaus tsaus ntuj, mas Xa‑u has tas, “Thov ua neeb rua kuv es coj tug tuag kws kuv qha npe rua koj lug.”

Tug puj hov teb Xa‑u tas, “Koj yeej paub tseeb lawm tas Xa‑u tub ua le caag, qhov kws nwg rhuav tshem tej txwv neeb txwv yaig huv lub tebchaws. Ua caag koj tseed tuaj ua ntxab ua hlua cuab kuv txujsa?”
Xa‑u tuav Yawmsaub lub npe twv tas, “Muaj Yawmsaub kws muaj txujsa nyob pum, koj yuav tsw raug txem tsua qhov kws ua neeb nuav.”
Tug puj hov txhad has tas, “Koj yuav kuas kuv hu leejtwg lug?” Xa‑u has tas, “Hu Xamuyee lug rua kuv.”
Thaus tug puj hov pum dheev Xamuyee tes txawm qw nrov nrov hab has rua Xa‑u tas, “Ua caag koj daag kuv? Koj tub yog Xa‑u ntaag.”
Vaajntxwv has rua tug puj hov tas, “Tsw xob ntshai le, koj pum daabtsw?” Tug puj has rua Xa‑u tas, “Kuv pum ib tug timtswv sawv huv nruab yeeb lug.”
Xa‑u nug tug puj has tas, “Nwg lub cev zoo le caag?” Tug puj hov teb tas, “Yog ib tug yawm laug naav lub tsho ntev sawv lug.” Xa‑u txhad paub tas yog Xamuyee, nwg txawm khoov ntshws pe rua huv aav.

Xamuyee has rua Xa‑u tas, “Koj hu kuv sawv lug taab kaum ua daabtsw?” Xa‑u teb tas, “Kuv muaj kev nyuaj sab heev vem yog cov Filixatee ua rog rua kuv hab Vaajtswv tig hlo ntawm kuv moog lawm tsw teb kuv dua le lawm, tsw has teb ntawm cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug lossws teb huv tej npau suav. Yog le nuav kuv txhad thov hu koj sawv lug sub koj txhad qha kuv paub tas kuv yuav tsum ua daabtsw.”
Xamuyee has tas, “Thaus Yawmsaub tig hlo ntawm koj hab ua yeeb ncuab rua koj lawm, ua caag koj tseed tuaj nug kuv?
Yawmsaub ua rua koj yaam le kws nwg tub kuas kuv has rua koj lawd. Yawmsaub muab lub tebchaws dua ntawm koj txhais teg hab muab cob rua lwm tug kaav yog Tavi.
Tub yog vem koj tsw noog Yawmsaub tej lug hab ua lawv le kws nwg npau tawg rua cov Amalej, nub nua Yawmsaub txhad ua tej nuav rua koj.

Tsw taag le ntawd xwb Yawmsaub yuav muab koj hab cov Yixayee huvsw cob rua huv cov Filixatee txhais teg. Pigkig koj hab koj cov tub yuav nrug kuv nyob, hab Yawmsaub yuav muab Yixayee cov tub rog cob rua huv cov Filixatee txhais teg.”
Tes Xa‑u txawm qaug ntawg xyaab hlo rua huv peg teb taamswm ntawd, nwg ntshai kawg vem yog Xamuyee tej lug. Nwg tsw muaj zug hlo le lawm tsua qhov nwg tsw tau noj mov ib nub ib mos lawm.

Tug puj hov txhad lug rua ntawm Xa‑u. Thaus nwg pum tas Xa‑u ntshai kawg nwg has rua Xa‑u tas, “Kuv kws yog koj tug nkauj qhev yeej noog koj has. Kuv sev nyog txujsa yeem ua lawv le koj tej lug txhua yaam.
Vem le nuav thov koj noog koj tug nkauj qhev has. Ca kuv muab mivntswv zaub mov rua koj, koj ca le noj txhad muaj zug taug kev rov qaab moog.”
Xa‑u kuj tsw kaam, nwg has tas, “Kuv tsw noj.” Tassws nwg cov tub teg tub taw hab tug puj hov txhob txhob nwg, nwg txhad noog puab has. Nwg sawv lug nyob sau lub txaaj.
Tug puj hov muaj ib tug mivnyuas nyuj rog rog nyob ntawm tsev nwg txawm maaj nroog muab tua. Nwg muab moov mog lug zuaj cub ua ncuav tsw xyaw keeb.
Nwg coj lug rau rua Xa‑u hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw noj. Puab noj taag tes txawm rov qaab moog tsev mo ntawd.
Cov Filixatee txhwj cov tub rog huvsw tuaj rua ntawm Afe, mas cov Yixayee ua yeej rua ntawm lub hauv dej txhawv ntawm lub moos Yile‑ee.
Thaus Filixatee cov thawj coj tej paab tub rog kws ib puas leej ib txheeb leej hlaa moog mas Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg kuj ua paab tom qaab kws nrug Akhij ua ke.

Filixatee cov thawj rog has tas, “Cov tuabneeg Henplais tuaj ua daabtsw ntawm nuav?” Mas Akhij has rua Filixatee cov thawj rog tas, “Nuav yog Tavi, kws yog cov Yixayee tug vaajntxwv Xa‑u le ib tug tub teg tub taw, nwg tub nrug kuv nyob tsheej xyoo lawm. Txwj nub kws nwg tswv tuaj cuag kuv kuv kuj tsw pum nwg muaj ib qho txhum le txug naj nub nwgnuav.”

Tassws Filixatee cov thawj rog chim rua vaajntxwv mas puab rov has rua vaajntxwv tas, “Ca le xaa tug yawm nuav rov qaab moog tsev. Ca nwg rov moog nyob rua huv lub moos kws koj tu rua nwg. Tsw xob kheev nwg nrug peb moog ua rog ua ke tsaam tes nwg ua yeeb ncuab rua peb. Tsua qhov nwg yuav ua le caag rov moog nrug nwg tug vaajntxwv sws raug zoo tau? Sub tsw yog muab peb cov tuabneeg nuav taubhau coj moog pauv lov?
Tug yawm nuav tub yog Tavi nev, yog tug kws puab hu nkauj seev cev has tas, ‘Xa‑u tua tau quas txheeb leej Tavi tua tau quas vaam leej.’ ”

Akhij txhad hu Tavi lug has rua nwg tas, “Muaj Yawmsaub kws muaj txujsa nyob pum, koj tub ua ncaaj ua nceeg lug lawm. Yog ntawm kuv tug mas kuv pum zoo ca koj nrug kuv moog ua rog, tsua qhov kuv tsw pum koj ua ib qho txhum txwj nub kws koj lug nrug kuv nyob txug naj nub nwgnuav le. Tassws txawm le caag los xwj cov thawj rog tsw nrug kuv pum koj zoo.
Ua le nuav thov koj rov qaab moog ua sab tug quas yeeg sub txhad tsw ua rua Filixatee cov thawj tsw txaus sab.”

Mas Tavi has rua Akhij tas, “Kuv tau ua daabtsw? Txwj nub kws kuv lug ua koj le num txug naj nub nwgnuav koj pum kuv kws yog koj tug qhev ua ib yaam daabtsw kws yuav tsw tswm nyog kuv moog ua rog rua koj tej yeeb ncuab? Koj yog kuv tug tswv hab kuv tug vaajntxwv.”

Akhij teb Tavi tas, “Kuv paub hab kuv lub qhov muag pum koj tsw ua ib qho txhum, koj zoo yaam nkaus le Vaajtswv ib tug tubkhai sau ntuj. Tassws Filixatee cov thawj rog has tas, ‘Tsw xob kheev nwg nrug peb moog ua rog le.’
Ua le nuav koj hab Xa‑u cov tub teg tub taw kws nrug koj tuaj ca le sawv ntxuv, mas taagkig thaus pum kev tes ca le rov qaab moog.”
Tavi txawm sawv ntxuv nrug nwg cov tuabneeg rov qaab moog rua cov Filixatee tebchaws. Tassws cov Filixatee mas nce moog peg Yile‑ee.
Tau peb nub Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg lug txug ntawm Xilaj mas cov Amalej tub moog lws Neke hab Xilaj lawm. Puab kov yeej Xilaj hab muab hlawv pov tseg,
hab nteg cov quaspuj hab txhua tug kws nyob huv coj moog, nteg cov laug hab cov mivnyuas huvsw. Puab tsw tua ib tug pov tseg le, puab muab kuav huvsw taug kev moog.
Thaus Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg lug txug ntawm lub moos mas pum lub moos hov kub nyab lawm, hab puab tej quaspuj tej tub tej ntxhais kuj raug muab nteg coj taag lawm.
Mas Tavi hab cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg kuj tsaa suab hlo quaj heev, quaj quaj qaug zug quaj tsw taug lawm.
Tavi ob tug quaspuj kuj raug muab nteg moog, yog Ahinau‑aa kws yog tuabneeg Yile‑ee hab yog Anpikayi kws yog Nanpaa huv Khamee tug quaspuj kws ua puj ntsuag.

Tavi kuj nyuaj sab kawg le tsua qhov cov pejxeem has zum quas zawg tas xuas pob zeb muab nwg ntaus. Puab kuj mob sab kawg le rua puab tej tub tej ntxhais. Mas Tavi kuj cuab zug huv Yawmsaub kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv.
Tavi has rua pov thawj Anpiyatha kws yog Ahimelej tug tub tas, “Coj lub efauj  lug rua kuv.” Anpiyatha kuj coj lub efauj lug rua Tavi.

Tavi txawm nug Yawmsaub tas, “Kuv yuav moog lawv paab tub rog hov los tsw moog? Kuv yuav moog caum cuag puab los tsw cuag?” Yawmsaub teb nwg tas, “Ca le moog lawv, koj yeej yuav caum cuag puab hab cawm tau puab.”
Tavi hab rau pua leej kws nrug nwg txhad sawv kev moog. Puab moog txug lub haav Npexau, mas cov kws moog tsw taug su hov ntawd.
Tavi hab plaub puas leej caum moog. Ob puas leej kws qaug zug heev hlaa tsw taug lub haav Npexau ca le su hov ntawd.
Puab ntswb ib tug tuabneeg Iyi tom haav xub tsuag, puab txhad coj nwg lug cuag Tavi. Puab pub ncuav rua nwg noj hab dej rua nwg haus.
Puab muab ib lub ncuav txwv cua hab ob re txwv maab qhuav rua nwg noj. Nwg noj taag mas txhad le muaj zug tuaj vem yog nwg tsw tau mov noj tsw tau dej haus tau peb nub peb mo lawm.

Mas Tavi nug nwg tas, “Koj yog leejtwg cov tuabneeg? Koj tuaj hovtwg tuaj?” Mas nwg teb tas, “Kuv yog ib tug tub hluas Iyi, kuv ua ib tug tuabneeg Amalej le qhev. Tau peb nub lawm kuv muaj mob mas kuv tug lospaav muab kuv tso pov tseg.
Peb moog lws Neke tebchaws thaaj kws yog cov Khelethi le hab yog Yuta le hab Neke kws yog Khalej le. Mas peb muab lub moos Xilaj hlawv pov tseg.”

Tavi has rua nwg tas, “Koj yuav coj kuv kev moog caum kuas cuag paab tub rog nuav los tsw coj?” Nwg teb tas, “Thov tuav Vaajtswv lub npe cog lug twv rua kuv tas koj yuav tsw muab kuv tua pov tseg hab tsw muab kuv cob rua huv kuv tug lospaav txhais teg, mas kuv yuav coj koj kev moog kuas txug paab tub rog hov.”

Thaus nwg coj Tavi kev moog txug mas pum puab nyob puv nkaus ntawm tej tshaav puam noj haus hab dha seev cev tsua qhov kws puab txeeb tau tej hov txhua chaw huv Filixatee tebchaws hab huv Yuta tebchaws lug ntau kawg le.
Mas Tavi tua puab thaus tsaus ntuj zuag ib mos hab ib nub tsaus ntuj. Tsw muaj ib tug txwvneej tswv dim le, tsuas yog plaub puas tug hluas kws caij ntxhuav txhad tswv dim xwb.
Tavi txhad tau tej hov txhua chaw kws cov Amalej lws moog hov huvsw rov qaab lug hab Tavi cawm tau nwg ob tug quaspuj lug.
Tej kws puab lws moog lawd tsw has laug hluas mivtub mivntxhais mas tsw poob ib yaam daabtsw le, Tavi muab tau huvsw rov lug.
Tavi tseed nteg tau puab tej nam paab tshws paab yaaj hab tej nam paab nyuj lug. Cov pejxeem lawv tej tsaj hov ua Tavi ntej mas puab has tas, “Tej nuav yog tej kws Tavi txeeb tau lug.”

Tavi txawm rov lug txug ob puas leej kws qaug zug lawv tsw cuag Tavi es Tavi muab tso tseg rua ntawm lub haav Npexau. Mas cov hov kuj tawm moog tog Tavi hab tog cov tuabneeg kws nrug Tavi ua ke. Thaus Tavi lug ze cov tuabneeg hov nwg has lug zoo rua puab.

Cov tuabneeg phem hab cov tuabneeg sab nqaim kws nrug Tavi moog txawm has tas, “Vem puab cov nuav tsw nrug peb moog mas peb tsw pub tej hov txhua chaw kws peb moog txeeb tau lug rua puab le, tsuas yog ca puab nyag coj nyag tej quaspuj mivnyuas moog xwb.”
Tassws Tavi has tas, “Kuv cov kwvtij, mej tsw xob ua le nuav rua tej kws Yawmsaub pub rua peb. Nwg tub tsom kwm peb ca hab muab paab tub rog kws tuaj ntaus peb rua huv peb txhais teg lawm.

Qhov nuav leejtwg yuav noog mej lub suab? Cov kws nqeg moog ntaus rog muaj feem tau le caag tes cov kws nyob zuv nraa kuj muaj feem tau sws npaug le hov hab. Ca le muab faib sws npaug zog rua suavdawg.”
Txwj nub hov lug Tavi kuj muab qhov nuav rhawv ua ib txuj kaab ke hab ib txuj kevcai rua cov Yixayee coj lug txug naj nub nwgnuav.

Thaus Tavi lug txug lub moos Xilaj lawd nwg kuj xaa tej kws nwg txeeb tau hov ib qho moog rua nwg tej phoojywg kws yog cov kev txwj quas laug huv Yuta, hab has rua puab tas, “Nuav yog muab ib qho tshaav ntuj rua mej, yog tej kws txeeb tau ntawm Yawmsaub cov yeeb ncuab lug.”
Nwg muab rua cov kws nyob huv Npe‑ee hab cov kws nyob huv Lamau huv Neke, hab cov kws nyob huv Yathi,
hab Alau‑aw hab Ximau hab Ethemau‑a,
hab Lakhaa, hab cov kws nyob huv Yelame‑ee cum tej moos hab huv cov Khenai tej moos,
huv Hauma hab Npaulasaa hab Athaj,
hab huv Heploo, yog muab rua txhua lub chaw kws Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg txeev moog moog lug lug rua huv.
Cov Filixatee tuaj ua rog rua cov Yixayee, mas cov Yixayee tswv cov Filixatee hab raug tua tuag rua sau lub roob Kinpau‑a.
Cov Filixatee lawv cuag Xa‑u hab nwg cov tub. Cov Filixatee tua Yaunathaa hab Anpinanta hab Makhisuva, kws yog Xa‑u le tub tuag taag.
Ua rog nyaav heev tuaj ti Xa‑u, cov tub rog tua neev ntswb Xa‑u, txawm tua raug nwg mob heev.

Tes Xa‑u txawm has rua tug kws nqaa nwg tej cuab yeej tas, “Ca le rhu ntaaj lug nkaug kuv kuas tshaab plawg, ntshai tsaam cov kws tsw ua kevcai txav nuav tuaj nkaug kuv es saib tsw taug kuv.” Tassws tug kws nqaa nwg tej cuab yeej tsw kaam nkaug vem yog ntshai heev. Tes Xa‑u txawm rhu hlo nwg raab ntaaj lug cuab es nwg khwb nkaus chob hlo raab ntaaj hov.
Thaus tug kws nqaa tej cuab yeej pum tas Xa‑u tuag lawm, nwg kuj cuab nwg raab ntaaj khwb nkaus chob nwg tuag ua ke hab.
Yog le nuav Xa‑u txhad tuag hab nwg peb tug tub hab tug kws nqaa tej cuab yeej hab Xa‑u cov tuabneeg suavdawg tuag tuab nub ntawd.

Thaus cov Yixayee kws nyob lub haav saab tid hab cov kws nyob ntawm tug dej Yalatee saab nub tuaj pum Yixayee cov tub rog tswv hab pum tas Xa‑u hab nwg cov tub tuag taag lawm, puab txawm tso puab tej moos tseg tswv taag, mas cov Filixatee lug nyob rua huv.
Nub tom qaab thaus cov Filixatee tuaj khaws cov kws raug tua tuag tej cuab yeej moog yuav, puab pum Xa‑u hab nwg peb tug tub tuag rua sau lub roob Kinpau‑a.

Puab txawm txav Xa‑u lub taubhau hab hle nwg tej cuab yeej ua rog. Puab tso tuabneeg tshaaj xuv moog thoob plawg Filixatee tebchaws, coj xuv zoo moog pav rua huv puab tej tsev teev daab hab pav rua cov pejxeem.
Puab muab Xa‑u tej cuab yeej ua rog khaws ca rua huv lub tsev teev daab Athalau. Puab muab Xa‑u lub cev khi dai rua ntawm lub moos Npesaa lub ntsaa loog.
Thaus cov tuabneeg huv lub moos Yanpe Kile‑a nov tej kws cov Filixatee ua rua Xa‑u lub cev tuag,

cov txwvneej kws sab luj sab tuab suavdawg txawm sawv tseeg moog ib mos kaaj ntug moog daws Xa‑u lub cev tuag hab nwg peb tug tub lub cev tuag ntawm Npesaa lub ntsaa loog. Puab coj lug rua ntawm lub moos Yanpe muab hlawv hov ntawd.
Puab coj cov pob txhaa moog log rua huv qaab tsob ntoo tamalis huv lub moos Yanpe, hab yoo mov tau xyaa nub.
